interestingFact: Japan has more than 5 million vending machines, the highest per capita in the world.
Brazil is home to the Amazon Rainforest, which produces 20% of the world's oxygen.
Canada has the longest coastline of any country in the world.
India is the birthplace of chess and yoga.
Australia is the only continent covered by a single country.
Egypt is home to the only remaining ancient wonder: the Great Pyramid of Giza.
Germany is known for having over 1,500 different types of sausages.
South Korea has the fastest average internet speed in the world.
